texts.fr: Jeune homme de 27ans, Ayawo est revendeur de friperie depuis 2010. Il est à son premier prêt à WAGES et cela lui servira de s'approvisionner en marchandises. Comme perspectives d'avenir, il espère agrandir son activité et subvenir à ses besoins.
texts.en:
Ayawo is a young man of 27 years.  He has been selling second-hand clothing since 2010.  This will be his first loan from the field partner, WAGES.  He plans to use the loan to buy more stock for his business.

In the future, Ayawo would like to expand his business and be able to provide more to satisfy his needs.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of shoes and clothes to sell.

loans.name: Tahirou

texts.fr: Tahirou jeune homme de 28ans est mariée à une revendeuse. En 2012, il a ouvert une boutique de produits d'alimentation générale(riz, huile végétale, sucre, tomate en boite...) et se fait aider par 01 personne. Le deuxième crédit sollicité à WAGES l'aidera à acheter plus de marchandises afin de répondre aux besoins des clients. Il souhaite agrandir son commerce et subvenir aux besoins de son frère.
texts.en:
Tahirou is a young 28-year-old man who is married to a retail merchant. In 2012, he opened a grocery store offering general food products (rice, vegetable oil, sugar, canned tomatoes, ...) and has one person to assist him.

The second credit requested from WAGES will help him to buy more goods to meet customer requirements. He wants to expand his business and take care of his brother's needs.

loans.use: buy general food products

loans.name: Kokousse

texts.fr: Éleveur de porc à Lomé depuis 2010, Kokousse demande un premier prêt pour acheter des aliments. Une personne lui prête main forte pour effectuer son activité. Il espère à l’avenir agrandir son activité et mieux s'occuper de la famille. Il a une femme et 03 enfants tous scolarisés. Mr Kokousse est quant à lui âgé de 51ans.
texts.en:
A pig breeder in Lomé since 2010, Kokousse is requesting a first loan to buy feed. He is assisted by one person in his activity.

He hopes in the future to expand his business and take better care of his family. He has a wife and three children attending school. Mr Kokousse himself is 51 years old.

loans.use: Buy feed to raise hogs

loans.name: Ana Guadalupe

texts.es: Ana de 46 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos (queso, crema, cuajada, requesón, etc.), desde hace 24 años, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la calidad del productos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos lácteos por mayor para poder continuar con su negocio que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Ana is 46 years old and a single mother. She lives with her two children in a house of her own. She has been selling dairy products (cheese, cream, cottage cheese, curd cheese, etc.) for twenty-four years. Her shop is located at her house. She has many customers thanks to the affordable prices she offers and the quality of her products. She asks for a loan to buy more dairy products wholesale in order to keep on with her business, which generates a good income.

loans.use: to buy dairy products wholesale.

loans.name: Relampago Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “RELAMPAGO” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Elva es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de chamarras, veta de productos por catálogo, venta de sábanas, venta de productos naturales, venta de lencería, servicio de cáterin, venta de camas, servicio de enfermería.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Elva es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de servicio de enfermería; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió al ingresar en una institución técnica, posteriormente decide trabajar en este rubro como asistente de enfermería.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de medicamentos naturales por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente implementará estos productos en su servicio. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la facilidad de crédito que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
Communal bank 'Relámpago' ('Lightning bolt') is in its first lending cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the focus group of Los Andes. It is comprised of eight members, with Elva as president. The members are engaged in various activities, such as: coat sales, catalogue sales, bed linen sales, natural product sales, undergarment sales, catering services, bed sales, nursing services.
Loans to the group benefit small women entrepreneurs; it is now Eva's turn. She tells us that this is her first time working with Pro Mujer and that she learned about the institution thanks to a friend, who was already a member of a group. Eva provides nursing services. She learned the trade at nursing school and decided to work as a nursing assistant.
She will use the loan to increase her working capital by buying natural medicine wholesale from sellers in La Paz, which she will then use for her work. Her business is her sole source of income, necessary to support her family, since she is single and has two children.
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she mentions the lending programs of the institution.

loans.use: to buy natural medicine.

loans.name: Gloria Elvira

texts.es: Gloria de 41 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus cinco hijos, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y responsable, se dedica desde hace 9 años a la venta de atol de maíz de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su casa, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz, azúcar, bolsas, etc. todo por mayor y asi seguir con sus ventas ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo.
texts.en: Gloria is 41 years old and a single mother. She lives with her five children in a house of her own. She is a very hard-working and responsible woman, who has been selling atole (a sweetened maize concoction) door-to-door in her area for nine years. She asks for a loan in order to buy more ingredients and supplies wholesale (maize, sugar, bags, etc.) so as to keep her business going, since it is her only source of income.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies wholesale.

loans.name: Walter Jheovanny

texts.es: Walter de 39 años de edad, posee un negocio de venta de comida ubicado cerca de su casa en una zona muy transitada, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, Walter vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de pollos, carnes, verduras, frutas, maíz, vegetales, etc. para seguir con su trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Walter is 39 and sells food close to his house in a very busy area. He has many customers thanks to the affordable prices he offers. He lives with his family in a house of their own. He asks for a loan to buy chicken, meat, vegetables, fruit, maize, etc., so as to keep his business going. His goal is to increase his income to enjoy a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food to sell.

loans.name: Dédé

texts.fr: Mère de famille, Dédé est mariée. Elle est revendeuse de produits cosmétiques depuis 1999. Son premier crédit l'aidera à acheter d'autres marchandises. Elle espère agrandir son activité et assurer l'épanouissement de la famille. Elle est âgée de 32ans.
texts.en:
Dede is a married mother. She has been selling cosmetics since 1999. Her first loan will help her buy more merchandise.

She hopes to expand her business and to ensure her family's development. She is 32 years old.

loans.use: buy cosmetics

loans.name: Azra

texts.en:
Azra is a 45-year-old married woman and the mother of 3 children. In order to support her husband in taking care of the family she began the business of milk selling. She owns buffaloes for milking and she is known in her town for providing good quality milk. 

She is happily supporting her family with the income generated. She has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales to that she can generate more income to cover her daily expenses.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to generate more income to cover her daily expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm supplies to tend to her carrots.

loans.name: Tacko's Group

texts.fr:
Inaugurer le 18 septembre 2013 dans la place publique du village, ce banc villageois compte en son sein des femmes qui habitent le même village et s’apprêtent à entreprendre des activités génératrices de revenu et de renforcer leur capacité de financement. Elles entretiennent des relations de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles s’activent dans le petit commerce. 

Madame Tacko, âgée de 58 ans (debout à l’extrême gauche avec une main gauche levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de cinq enfants dont trois garçon et deux filles mariées. Elle s’active dans le commerce de graines d’arachides et de bananes qu’elle achète dans un village environnants et le revendre dans son village.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter trois cent kilogramme d’arachide à 100 Fr CFA  le pot et vingt kilo de bananes à 175 Fr CFA le kilogramme pour le revendre en détails dans son village.

Les bénéfices me permettent d’une part d’aider mon mari à prendre en charge les besoins de la famille et d’autre part à accroître mon chiffre d’affaire.
texts.en:
Inaugurated on September 18, 2013 in the village's public square, this "banc villageois" loan association comprises women from the same village who are preparing to undertake income-generating activities and strengthen their financial capacities. They maintain relationships of solidarity and mutual aid. They are active retail merchants.

58-year-old Mrs Tacko (standing at the far right raising her left hand) is the group's featured borrower. She is the married mother of five children, three boys and two married daughters. She is active in trading groundnuts and bananas. She buys them in a nearby village and resells in her village.

With her new loan she intends to buy three hundred kilos of groundnuts at 100 CFA francs a jar and twenty pounds of bananas at 175 CFA francs a kilo, for retail sales in her village.

The profits will enable her to help her husband take care of the family's needs, and also to increase her turnover.

loans.use: buy three hundred kilos of groundnuts at 100 CFA francs a jar and twenty pounds of bananas at 175 CFA francs a kilo, for retail sales in her village.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SAN FRANCISCO” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Achacachi, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Hilda es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de leche, servicio de transporte.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Hilda es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción masiva de la institución que realizaron en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de leche; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años al observar la amplitud de mercado de este producto decide emprenderlo.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de alimento para ganado por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de su comunidad y posteriormente  la crianza comercializará sus productos. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella aún es soltera.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank "SAN FRANCISCO" is starting its first Pro Mujer loan cycle through the Achacachi Social Center.  The group has eight members and a management board, with Hilda as the secretary.  The members are involved in different business including milk sales and transportation service.

The loan will benefit small business owners, including Hilda.  This is her first experience with Pro Mujer and she joined by invitation through a mass promotion conducted by the institution in her area.  Her business is selling milk, which she decided to go into several years ago after observing how broad the market was.

The loan she is requesting is to increase her work capital so she can buy animal feed wholesale.  She will purchase goods from wholesale sellers in her community and then will later sell her products.  This style of work allows her to generate an income to support her family economically, since she is still single.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says it is the training offered by the institution.

loans.use: To buy animal feed, wholesale.

loans.name: Rosaura

texts.es: Rosaura tiene 40 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus cuatro hijos de 15 años, 9 años, 5 años y 2  años de edad. Rosaura trabaja como operaria en una empresa cercana a su localidad y el papá de sus hijos le apoya con la economía del hogar. Rosaura solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado y necesita mejorar. Con el monto solicitado comprará lamina galvanizada, madera y hierro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y de esta forma poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosaura, 40, lives in her own house with her four children, ages 15, 9, 5 and 2.  She works as an operator for a company near her community and the father of her children helps pay for household expenses.  

Rosaura is requesting a loan through FUSAI because she needs to change the roof of her house, which has deteriorated over time and needs repair.  She will use the loan to buy metal sheeting, wood and iron.  She hopes to receive the loan so she can improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy metal sheeting, wood and iron.

loans.name: Maria Epifania

texts.es: Maria de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de hamacas desde hace 15 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados y tiene clientes fijos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de hilos y nailon de diferentes colores por mayor para seguir con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria, 30, lives in her own house with her husband and three children.  She makes and sells hammocks and has been in business for 15 years.  Her products are sold at different markets to steady customers.

The loan she is requesting is to buy wholesale cord and nylon in different colors to continue working and to improve her income.

loans.use: To buy wholesale cord and nylon in different colors.

loans.name: Esperanza Dinora

texts.es: Esperanza de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas y antojitos desde hace 4 años su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes especialmente sus vecinos, ella esta solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de maíz, quesillo, chicharrón, frijoles, repollo, tomates, etc. para seguir con sus ventas ya que le ha ido muy bien en su negocio y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Esperanza, 42, lives in her own house with her family.  She sells pupusas (filled tortillas) and snacks and has been in business for four years.  She works out of her home and has many customers, especially her neighbors.

She is requesting a new loan to buy corn, cheese, pork cracklings, beans, cabbage, tomatoes, etc. to continue with sales.  Her business has gone very well until and she wants to improve her income.

loans.use: To buy corn, cheese, pork cracklings, beans, cabbage, tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Edwin Omar

texts.es: Edwin tiene 30 años de edad y vive con su esposa, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, elabora puertas, balcones, rejas entre otros, tiene 13 años de dedicarse a este negocio y tiene mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mejorar cada día su labor, ya tiene mucha clientela pues lo buscan por la calidad de su trabajo, por los precios accesibles pero sobre todo porque siempre realiza el trabajo al gusto del cliente; el solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar, hierro, metal, herramienta etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Edwin is 30 years old and he lives with his wife. He has a metallic structure shop. He makes doors, balconies, and bars, among other things. He has been working in this business for 13 years and he has a lot of experience, which helps him improve his work every day. he already has a lot of customers because they seek him out for the quality of his work and for the accessible prices but most of all because he always does the work to the taste of the customer. He is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy iron, metal, tools, etc. so that he can have better income.

loans.use: to buy iron, metal, tools, etc.

loans.name: Genny Elsa

texts.es:
En el sitio Rio Bravo de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Bankito Rio Bravo.
En este lugar vive la señora Genny, tiene 44 años de edad, está casada y de esta  relación tienen cinco hijos de 19, 16, 12, 10 y  8 años  de edad, dos de ellos  estudian en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo es artesano.
Doña Genny es una muy buena esposa que realiza el crédito para que su marido lo utilice en su trabajo, él se dedica a la fabricación de ladrillos (material utilizado en la construcción de viviendas), el junto a dos personas más elaboran estos ladrillos los mismos que entrega en el sitio a comerciantes que llegan hasta el lugar y se  encargan de  llevarlos a vender o entregar directo a las construcciones de viviendas, es así como el se gana el sustento y gracias a Dios nunca les ha faltado nada.
Este crédito es para comprar madera, aserrín y varios materiales que se necesitan para la elaboración de los ladrillos. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque el grupo es muy unido.  Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rio Bravo in Montecristi is a city known for its great diversity of typical products, such as the straw hats known both in and out of the country.  Every 15 days the communal bank "Bankito Rio Bravo" meets here.

This is where Genny, 44, lives.  She is married and has five children, ages 19, 16, 12, 10, and 8.  Three of them attend school.  Her husband is a craftsman.

Genny is a very good wife and she is requesting the loan so her husband can use it in his work.  He makes bricks (material used in building construction) and works with two other people making the bricks themselves.  They sell to merchants who visit them to place orders and the bricks are delivered directly to the construction sites.  This is how he earns a living, for which he is thankful.

The loan is to buy wood, sawdust and other materials needed to make bricks.  Genny has been in the group since it started and she likes it because the members are very close.  Her dream is to give her children the best she can.

loans.use: To buy wood, sawdust and other materials to make bricks.

loans.name: Teresa Del Jesus

texts.es:
En el sitio Rio Bravo de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Bankito Rio Bravo.
En este lugar vive la señora Teresa, tiene 68 años de edad, está casada y de esta  relación tienen 10 hijos mayores de edad, tres de ellos aun viven con ellos. Su esposo es agricultor.
Doña Teresa es una muy buena esposa y madre que para ayudarle a su marido realiza el crédito para que él lo utilicen en su trabajo, el tienen una pequeña fábrica de ladrillos, trabajan todos los días y  estos  ladrillos los entregan en el mismo lugar a comerciantes para luego llevarlos a vender a otras ciudades donde son utilizados para la construcción de viviendas, ellos llevan más de 21 años dedicados a esta actividad con la cual luchan para darles lo mejor a sus familias.
Este crédito es para comprar aserrín y otros materiales  para elaborar los ladrillos. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son tener buena salud para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Rio Bravo de Montecristi is a city known for its diversity of traditional products, such as the paja toquillas hats known inside and outside of the country. There the members of the credit group Bankito Rio Bravo meet every two weeks.

That is where Teresa lives. She is 68 years old, married and from her marriage has 10 grown children. Three of them still live with them. Her husband is a farmer. Teresa is a good wife and mother who is taking out the loan so that her husband can use it for his work. He has a small brick factory. They work every day and deliver the bricks in the same area to merchants to later be sold in different cities where they are used to build houses. They have been doing this activity for more than 21 years and with it they fight to give the best to their family. 

This loan is to buy sawdust and other materials to make the bricks. She has been in the credit group since the beginning and she likes it because of the help the loans give. Her dreams are to have good health for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy sawdust and other materials to make bricks.

loans.name: Ricardo Rafael

texts.es: Ricardo vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el posee desde hace 8 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, el está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ricardo lives in his own house with his family group. For 8 years, he has had a little store located in his residence. He has a lot of customers because of the good prices and his friendliness when he sells. He is asking for a loan to be able to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, beverages, snacks, sweet bread, etc., so that he can have more income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, beverages, snacks, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Juana Elba

texts.es:
En el sitio Rio Bravo de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Bankito Rio Bravo.
En este lugar vive la señora Juana, tiene 56 años de edad, hace varios años su esposo falleció pero de esa relación tuvo  4 hijos son mayores  de edad, dos de ellos aun viven con ella.
Doña Juana es una mujer muy luchadora que para salir adelante y con esto sacar adelante a sus hijos ella sola hace varios años atrás y con lo pudo  surtió una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende víveres de toda clase así como también helados y otras bebidas, ella también con la ayuda de sus hijos tienen una fábrica de ladrillos (material utilizado en la construcción de viviendas), mientras sus hijos se encargan de la ladrillera ella en su casa se encarga de su tienda y de la venta de los ladrillo ya que hasta ahí llegan comerciantes que luego llevan este material a las construcciones donde los venden.
Este crédito es para comprar víveres para surtir su tienda, helados y  materia prima para elaborar los ladrillos. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque siempre los  créditos le ayudan en su negocio, sus sueños son seguir adelante.
texts.en:
In the Río Bravo area of Monecristi, a city known for its great diversity of typical products, such as straw hats that are known nationally and internationally, the "Bankito Río Bravo" communal bank meets every fortnight.

And it is here that 56-year-old Juana lives. Her husband died some years ago. She has four children (now adults), two of whom still live at home.

Juana is a very plucky woman and is working to move forward and, now alone for some years, help her children to get ahead. Juana has a small shop stocked up with goods in her house. There she sells all sorts of items, such as ice cream and dreams. With the help of her children, Juana also has a brick (used to build local houses) factory. While her children tend to brick production, Juana looks after the shop and sells the bricks to traders who come to buy the materials to take to sell at building sites.

This loan will be used to buy supplies for her shop (such as ice creams) and items for making bricks. Juana has been with the loan group since its creation and she likes it because the loans help with her business. Juana's dreams are to move forward in life.

loans.use: to buy supplies, ice creams and supplies for making bricks.

loans.name: Las Triunfadoras Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS TRIUNFADORAS” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Achacachi, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Yola es la Tesorera. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de leche, servicio de transporte, venta de queso.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Yola es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción masiva de la institución que realizaron en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de queso; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años al observar la variedad de productos que derivan de la leche se especializó en el queso, el cual comercializa ampliamente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ganado) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de su comunidad y posteriormente  la crianza comercializará sus productos en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en concubinato y tienen cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.

En la imagen se identifica al esposo de una de las clientes, él mismo esta con una gorra blanca, quien quiso acompañar a la Banca Comunal en la pequeña merienda que compartian
texts.en:
The "Las Triunfadoras" communal bank is beginning its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer through its Achacachi communal bank. Made up of eight members and run by a board of directors that has Yola as its treasurer, the members have the various types of businesses, including: selling milk, transport services, and selling cheese.

This loan will benefit micro-businesses in Yola's group. Yola herself tells us that this is the first time that she has worked with Pro Mujer, and joined following a large advertising campaign by the organisation in her local area. Yola currently has a business selling cheese. She says that she learned this trade some years ago when she saw the variety of products that derive from milk. Among these, Yola specialised in cheese, which she sells plenty of.

This loan will be used to increase capital by buying cattle from bulk sellers in the community. Yola will then raise the animals and sell her products at her stall. This type of work allow Yola to earn an income to support her family financially. Yola has a partner and four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Yola responds that she likes the training offered by the organisaiton.

In the photograph, the husband (wearing a white cap) of one member also appears. He also shared the snack with the loan group.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Carmen Porfiria

texts.es:
En el sitio Rio Bravo de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Bankito Rio Bravo.
En este lugar vive la señora Carmen, tiene 59 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tienen seis hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive con ellos. Su esposo es agricultor.
Doña Carmen tiene una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende solo víveres ya que no es muy grande su negocio, también tiene una pequeña granja en la cual se dedica a la cría de pollos y chanchos, ella compra los animalitos cuando están pequeños los cría por tres meses a los pollos y cuando tienen un peso adecuado los pela y vende por libras en su tienda, en cuanto a los chanchos los vende a comerciantes que llegan hasta su casa, con esto ella se gana lo suyo que les sirven para salir adelante ya que su marido no gana mucho en sus actividades en el campo.
Este crédito es para comprar víveres para surtir la tienda y alimento para los pollos y chanchos. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde el inicio y le gusta porque con el primer crédito surtió su tienda. Sus sueños seguir mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
In the Río Bravo area of Monecristi, a city known for its great diversity of typical products, such as straw hats that are known nationally and internationally, the "Bankito Río Bravo" communal bank meets every fortnight.

And it is here that 59-year-old Carmen lives. She has a partner and six adult children, one of whom still lives at home. Carmen's partner is a farmer.

Carmen has a small grocery shop in her house. She sells only groceries as her business is not very big. She also has a small farm where she raises pigs and chickens. She buys the animals when they are young, raises them for three months and then, once the chickens are big enough, skins and sells them by the pound in her shop. She sells the pigs to traders who come to her home. These businesses allow Carmen to earn a living and move ahead. Carmen's husband does not earn a lot at his work in the countryside.

This loan will be used to buy supplies for her shop and feed for chicken and pigs. Carmen has been with the loan group since its inception and she likes it because she stocked up her shop with her first loan. Carmen's dream is to continue improving her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies and feed for chicken and pigs.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 52 años vive en una comunidad llamado Guineales, tiene 7  hijos y todos viven con él. 
José vive en una zona donde se produce mucho banano, pues viendo toda esta producción él desde hace 8 años tomo la iniciativa  de comprar y vender bananos, él vende al menudeo y por quintal a las personas que lo revenden, por los años de experiencia conoce diversidad de bananos y él es muy reconocido por la gente y por la calidad del producto que vende,  pues gracias a Dios el siempre vende, y esta es la manera como José genera sus ingresos, José de los siete hijos que tiene unos se dedican a la elaboración de güipiles, otros son agricultores y otros están estudiando.
 
Lo poco que ganan los hijos, apoyan a su padre, pero esto no es  suficiente para realizar otras compras para el beneficio de ellos, pues con ese obstáculo solicitan un prestamo para comprar dos cuerdas de terreno, para que cuando ellos formen su propio hogar tengan un espacio donde construir cada quien su propia casa. 
José seguirá luchando con su negocio, para que una parte de sus ingresos abone al prestamo y la otra para cubrir otros gastos, y de igual forma sus hijos tendrá que contribuir en algo  para aportar en lo que necesita la familia como alimentación, vestuario y otras necesidades.
texts.en:
José is 52 years old and lives in Guinelaes communtiy. He has seven children, all of whom still live at home.

José lives in an area with a high banana production. Eight years ago, José decided to buy and sell this product both retail and by the hundredweight to others who will re-sell them. With his years of experience, José knows a lot about the diversity of bananas. He is well-known by people and for the quality of his products. Thanks to God, José is always selling his goods and thus earns a living. Of José's children, one makes Indian clothes, another is studying and the rest are farmers.

José's children use the little money they earn to support their father but this is not enough to be able to buy other items for them. As a result, José is applying for a loan in order to buy land so that, when José's children have their own homes they will have a space to build their own houses.

José will continue fighting for his business. Part of his income will go to paying back this loan while the rest will cover other expenses. José's children will have to continue contributing in order to provide everything that the family needs, such as food, clothing and other necessities.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Edita Del Rocio

texts.es:
En el sitio Rio Bravo de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Bankito Rio Bravo.
En este lugar vive la señora Edita, tiene 35 años de edad, está casada y de esta  relación tienen tres hijos de  12, 6 y  2 años  de edad, los mayores  estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo es artesano.
Doña Edita es una muy buena esposa que para ayudarle a su marido realiza el crédito para que él lo utilice en su trabajo, él se dedica a la fabricación de ladrillos (material utilizado en la construcción de viviendas), el entrega en el sitio a comerciantes que llegan hasta el lugar para trasladarlos hasta las ciudades cercanas donde son utilizados, ella por su parte desde su hogar se gana algo por su cuenta, vende helados, colas, aguas, jugos entre otras cosas con lo cual se gana algo y contribuye más que todo con gastos relacionados a los estudios de sus hijos.
Este crédito es para comprar  madera,  tierra y otros materiales para elaborar los ladrillos, helados y colas para su negocio. Está desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos salen adelante. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en: The credit group ‘Bankito Rio Bravo’ meets every 15 days in Rio Bravo, Montecristi. This city is well-known for its wide range of local products such as its toquilla straw hats, which are famous both at home and abroad. This is where Edita, 35, lives. She is married and has three children aged 12, 6 and 2. The two older children attend high school and school respectively. Her husband is an artisan. Edita is a good wife who is asking for the loan so her husband can use it in his job. He makes bricks for construction and sells it to traders who buy off him and then transport the bricks to wherever they are needed in neighboring areas. Edita earns a small income herself by selling by selling frozen treats, Cola, water, juice, and other things from home. This allows her to earn some money which she can put towards her children’s education. This loan is to buy wood and earth to make bricks and to buy frozen goods and Cola for her business. She has been with the credit group since just after it was founded and she is grateful for the help she receives. Her dream is to give her family the best she can.

loans.use: to buy wood, earth and other materials to make bricks, frozen treats and Colas.

loans.name: Kousar

texts.en: Kousar is a 29-year-old married woman. She is a vigorous lady. For the past many years, she has been running a cloth purchase and sale business. She buys cloth in various fabrics, in different colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. Now, she has requested for a loan of 40,000 PKR  to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her business. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan. Kousar  expects a boost in her earnings with the loan and she plans to spend the part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her cloth selling business.

loans.name: Ruqiya

texts.en: Ruqiya  is a 35-year-old married woman. She is the mother of three children. She has been doing a business of animal sales and purchase for many years with her husband. After buying small animals, they raise them for a year or two and then sell them in their locality. Now, she has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR. She wants to use this loan amount  to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market. She desires to improve her standard of living thorough all her efforts.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market.

loans.name: Sameena

texts.en: Sameena is a married woman and has been running her own beauty parlor on her street. She is doing her job passionately; she is a well-known beautician in her town. Sameena is a responsible mother of two children. Her husband is not in good physical shape to be employed, so she is working hard to meet their day-to-day expenses. She has slowly but surely improved her business through the support of Kashf Foundation. Now she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR  to buy more beauty products for her beauty parlor including lotions, makeup kits and lightening creams to cater to a large number of customers efficiently to earn good amount of income for bearing her everyday expenditures.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products for her beauty parlor, including lotions, makeup kits and lightening creams to cater to a large number of customers efficiently.

loans.name: Umme  Kalsoom

texts.en: Umme Kalsoom is a 35-year-old married woman. She is been involved in the business of cloth trade along with her husband, who is also shown in the photo. She purchases variety of cloth at low prices from city market and sells them in her own town. She has a strong customer base. Umme Kalsoom has requested for a loan of 40,000 PKR. She wants to buy greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business to get a boost in her earnings with her loan.

loans.use: to buy greater variety of cloth in different colors for her cloth selling business to get boost in her earnings with her loan.

loans.name: Tozagul

texts.ru:
Tozagul is 56 years old. She is kind and generous. Tozagul is married and has children. She does not have higher education. Tozagul always is trying to do all for her family, she tries improve living condition and want that her children and grandchildren get an education.
   For now Tozagul is involved in agriculture. She prepared a soil for sowing of wheat and potatoes. Tozagul applyed for a loan in order to buy potatoes and wheat seeds. If she cannot buy them, Tozagul will lose source of income. Income from crop is main source for her family. Tozagul hope that you can help her.
texts.en:
Tozagul is 56 years old. She is kind and generous. Tozagul is married and has children. She does not have higher education. Tozagul always is trying to do everything for her family. She is trying to improve her living conditions and wants her children and grandchildren get an education.

For now Tozagul is involved in agriculture. She has prepared the soil for sowing wheat and potatoes. Tozagul applied for a loan in order to buy potatoes and wheat seeds. If she cannot buy them, Tozagul will lose this source of income. Income from her crops is the main source of money for her family. Tozagul hopes that you can help her.

loans.use: to plant wheat and potatoes

loans.name: Halima

texts.en: Halima, 40, is a married woman. The man shown in the photo is Halima’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now his vehicle requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Halima has applied for a loan of 40000 PKR for her husband. He wants to buy new tires and some auto spare parts for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport services to his passengers. Halima  is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and some auto spare parts

loans.name: Kalsoom

texts.en: Kalsoom, 41, is a married woman. She has 4 children. She is a vigorous lady, and for the past many years, has been running a business buying and selling cloth. She buys various fabrics in different colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. Now, she has requested a loan of 45000 PKR to buy a wide variety of cloths in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her business. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan. Kalsoom expects a boost in her earnings with the loan and she plans to spend part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloths in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her business.

loans.name: Amanecer Santiago Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “AMANECER SANTIAGO” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Santiago II, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Melchora es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de comida, venta de afrecho, venta de cosméticos, venta de fruta.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Melchora es integrante, ella indica que hace tres años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de abarrotes; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio con un pequeño capital que tenía de un negocio anterior, al observar el amplio comercio de los abarrotes decide invertir su dinero en ese negocio. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de abarrotes por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de Santa Cruz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es divorciada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Communal Association "Amanecer Santiago" will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Santiago II. It is made up of 8 members, and is administrated by a directive table in which the Señora Melchora is President. The businesses that the members work in are various, and among them are: the selling of food, the selling of cereals, selling of cosmetics and the selling of fruit.  

The loan that they will take out will benefit small micro-businesses where Señora Melchora is a member. She indicates that she joined Pro Mujer three years ago, upon the invitation of a friend who is a client of the institution. Now, she has a business selling groceries, which she started with a small amount of capital that she had from a prior business. Upon observing the large grocery trade she decided to invest her money in that type of business.

The loan that she will take out is to increase her capital by purchasing wholesale groceries from the salespeople in the markets of Santa Cruz. Then, she will sell these items herself. This form of work allows her to generate resources to support her family economically, since she is divorced and has three children. 

When she was asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the health services that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy wholesale grocery items.

loans.name: Cruz

texts.es: Crus de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella posee una pequeña tienda desde hace 3 años ubicada en su lugar de residencia vende una variedad de productos como golosinas, refrescos, granos básicos, café, sopas, huevos, gelatinas, azúcar, etc. y tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así podrá tener mejores ganancias para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Crus is 53 years old and lives in her own house with her husband. She has has a small store located in her place of residence for the past 3 years. She sells a variety of products like sweets, soft drinks, basic grains, coffee, soup, eggs, jello, sugar, etc. She has many clients because of her good prices. She is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise wholesale as this is her only source of income. Doing this she can increase her profits and have a higher quality of living.

loans.use: to buy sweets, soft drinks, basic grains, coffee, soup, eggs, jello, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Maa Bhairabi Shg Group

texts.en:
Rita is 32 years old. She lives with her parent-in-laws, her husband, and two children in her in-law's home. Both of her children are in school. Her husband is a day laborer and works installing electricity in homes. Today she seeks her first loan with Peoples Forum and will use it to buy groceries  in order to increase her business merchandise. 

She hopes in the near future to be able to have a location in the comfort of a city in order to provide comfort to her customers and be able to increase her sales. She will build her own home and give her children an education.The other members of this group are engaged in different activities such as selling food items, fruits, vegetables, milk etc. The group would like to thank Kiva and its lenders for this great support.

loans.use: to buy groceries  in order to increase the business's merchandise.

loans.name: Kasietkhan

texts.ru: Касиетхан 57 лет, замужем, есть 2 детей. Образование у Касиетхан среднее, она на протяжении 20 лет занимается животноводством. По характеру она очень ответственная и трудолюбивая. В хозяйстве Касиетхан есть 4 коровы, 12 овец. Ежедневно Касиетхан продает экологически чистое молоко, которое пользуется большим спросом среди местных жителей, которым она и реализует молоко. Совокупный доход Касиетхан составляет около 15,000 (KGS) в месяц. В целях развития своего бизнеса она обратилась в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 6 коров. Увеличение прибыли от бизнеса позволит Касиетхан расширить хозяйство и улучшить ее условия проживания.
texts.en: Kasietkhan is 57, married, and has two children. She has a secondary education and has worked with livestock for 20 years. She is very responsible and hardworking by nature. She has four cows and 12 sheep on her farm. She sells organic milk every day to the local residents, which is a popular product. She earns about 15,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to expand her business she applied for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy six cows. Increasing her profits will allow Kasietkhan to expand her business and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase six cows and increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Sarai Abigail

texts.es:
Saraí, de 28 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está divorciada, tiene dos hijos que aún  dependen de ella.

Saraí, se dedica a la venta de ropa, tiene 1 año de dedicarse a ésta actividad productiva, la cual la comenzó por iniciativa propia, ya que cuando estaba estudiando comenzó a vender ropa y se dio cuenta que este negocio tenía bastante demanda en época escolar, ella abre su bazar de 8:00 a.m. en adelante.

Saraí, invertirá el crédito para comprar más mercadería como: calcetas, bóxer, calcetas y otro tipo de ropa, de esa manera logrará tener más ingresos y darles lo mejor a sus dos hijos.

Sus sueños son ampliar su negocio, tener salud para trabajar siempre y que sus hijos estudien y que en un futuro sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Saraí is 28 years old and studied through high school. She is divorced and has two children dependent on her.

She's worked selling clothing for a period of one year. This is productive work that she began of her own initiative, since she had started selling clothes as a student and found that this business had a lot of demand during the school year. She opens her bazaar from 8 am on.

Saraí will invest the loan in the purchase of more merchandise such as socks, boxer shorts and other items. She will thus be able to increase her profits and give the best to her two children.

Her dreams are to expand the business, to be healthy so she can always work, and to see her children study and become professionals in the future.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise such as socks, boxer shorts, and other clothing items.

loans.name: Eva Del Carmen

texts.es: Eva de 51 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de gallinas, su negocio está ubicado en el mercado municipal desde hace 15 años, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas gallinas por mayor para seguir con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Eva is a 51 year old single mother who lives in her own house with her 2 children. She works selling chickens. Her business is located in the municipal market where she has been for the past 15 years. She has lots of clients due to her good prices. She is requesting a loan to buy more chickens wholesale to continue with her sales and thus have more income.

loans.use: to buy more chickens wholesale.

loans.name: Artesanas Group

texts.es:
Martha es una mujer de 43 años de edad, soltera, tiene 3 hijos de 12, 15 y 17 años, y su negocio es la artesanía en cuero.
Ella es emprendedora, sociable, independiente, agradable, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘plan 3000’ un área caracterizada por el gigantesco crecimiento de su población; mineros relocalizados del occidente y etnias como ‘Los Ayoreos’ nativas del lugar, se establecieron en el área. La siguiente generación, en su mayoría se ocupa del comercio y manufactura en todas las áreas. De clima cálido, tropical y húmedo, con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Martha es de tez trigueña, cabello negro largo amarrado, ojos marrones, baja estatura, su lengua materna es el Guaraní y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza (sentada usa blusa celeste clarito). Su vida la comparte con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela y practican deportes, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina, que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Sus deseos de superación la llevaron a liderar una banca de personas con negocios como; tienda de videos, venta de celulares, taller de costura, venta de vajillas, venta de carne de pollo, venta de flores y servicio de té, para solicitar un préstamo y cumplir sus objetivos. Su negocio es la artesanía en cuero, como; Bolsos, de mano, mochilas, carteras, billeteras, monederos y regalos originales. Labor que realiza en su domicilio curtiendo el cuero hasta moldear la forma deseada. “el trabajo en cuero es un arte muy inspirador, cada prenda es única…” comenta. Su sueño es tener una tienda propia donde pueda vender sus productos con comodidad. Ella desea realizar la compra de cuero por mayor para elaborar carteras y artículos en cuero. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Martha solicita un préstamo para la compra de cuero por mayor para la elaboración de bolsones y artículos en general.
texts.en:
Martha, age 43, is single and has three children, ages 12, 15, and 17.  Her business is leather handicrafts.  She is enterprising, cordial, independent, nice, responsible, and hard-working.  She conducts her business in the Plan 3000 area.  The area is known for its gigantic population growth, miners relocated from the west, and ethnic groups like ‘Los Ayoreaos’, who are native to the place and established themselves in the area.  The following generation mainly works in all areas of commerce and manufacturing.  It has a warm, tropical, and humid climate.  During the day the temperature varies between 21 and 35 degrees centigrade.

Martha is olive-skinned, has long black hair that is tied back, brown eyes, and is short.  Her native language is Guaraní, and she speaks Spanish because of the general culture and for her business.  (She is seated and has on a sky blue blouse.)  She shares her life with her children, who go to school and play sports.  They live in their own house that is built from bricks and has a metal roof.  They have potable water, electricity, and sewers.  

Her wishes to improve herself took her to lead a communal bank of people with businesses like a video store, cell phone sales, sewing shop, dish sales, chicken sales, flower sales, and tea service.  She did this in order to request a loan and meet her objectives.

Her business is handicrafts in leather like handbags, backpacks, wallets, change purses, and original gifts.  She works at her house tanning the leather and molding it into the desired form.  “Leather work is a very inspiring art; each item is unique,” she says.  Her dream is to have her own store where she could sell her products comfortably.

She wishes to buy leather wholesale in order to make the wallets and other leather items.  This is her first loan cycle with the institution in the three years she has been engaged in this business activity.

It is for these reasons that Martha is requesting a loan to buy leather wholesale in order to make handbags and other items.

loans.use: to buy leather wholesale in order to make handbags and other items.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en: Nasreen, 35,is a married woman. She is running a business selling milk with her husband (also shown in the photo). She has buffaloes and cows for milk production. Her husband sells the milk in nearby areas. Nasreen’s job is to look after the buffaloes and collect the milk from them. Together, both husband and wife are supporting their family. However, they need to earn more income for their everyday expenditures. Therefore, Nasreen  has requested a loan of 45000 PKR  to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers and to provide a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo.

loans.name: Sairam Shg Group

texts.en:
Ahalya is the featured borrower for the Sairam Shg. She joined with her group members to request this loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. Ahalya and her loan group members are working hard to develop their businesses and improve their living at the same time.

Ahalya is a 38-year-old married mother of two children.Two years ago, she started to prepare and sell food such as Bada, Samosa, Puri, Chhola, Idli (Odisha's breakfast and snack item) etc., from her house to help her husband cover the needs and expenses of their family. She is a hard worker who is trying desperately to develop her business.

Ahalya will use her portion of the group loan from the Kiva field partner Peoples Forum to buy necessary raw materials such as oil, vegetables, rice, rice flour, sugar, fruits, and other products. Her loan will help her increase her production, satisfy her customers, and increase her income. Ahalya is the first lady on the right of the photo.  On behalf of her group, Ahalya would like to thank Kiva and its lenders for the opportunity they are receiving.

loans.use: to buy necessary raw materials such as oil, vegetables, rice, rice flour, sugar, fruits, and other products

loans.name: Maa Mangala Shg Group

texts.en:
Jharana is a 26-year-old mother of two children. She lives with her husband and her two children, one daughter and one son, in the Dhenkanal district, Odisha, India. Her oldest daughter is studying at a junior school, and her son is studying at home. 

Her family’s main occupation is sow breeding, goat breeding for meat and mushroom growing. It is said that selling several animals can bring in tens of rupees every year in profit, but it is just enough for covering food. The rest is not enough to invest more in the breeding business to get more income for the family. That is why Jharana really wants to borrow a loan for investing in this purpose. Along with her group, she has requested this loan and she will use her portion to invest more in the breeding business.

She will work hard to earn money to repay Peoples Forum and she hopes that the loan will help her family invest in developing better breeding and her family life will be improved. On the behalf of her group, Jharana says, "Thank you, Kiva, for this opportunity".

loans.use: to invest more in her livestock breeding business.

loans.name: Tulimbe Group

texts.en:
Lydia is 39 years old; she has four children and looks after one orphan.  Lydia has difficulties in paying school fees and medical bills for her children. For this reason, she started getting loans from the MicroLoan Foundation in order to start up a new business. She sells second-hand clothes to people surrounding her community. 

The funds she gets from her business help her to improve her family’s living standards by providing her children with food and clothing. She would like to get another loan in order to expand her business and this will help her to at least find enough money for paying school fees for children. 

Lydia hopes to send her children to better schools and plans to build a better house for her family. The profits from her previous loan have helped her to provide food to her children three times a day unlike before.

loans.use: To buy second-hand clothes

loans.name: Umme  Kalsoom

texts.en: Umme Kalsoom is 32 years old, a married woman. She is been involved in the business of cloth trade. She purchases a variety of lengths of cloth at low prices from the city market and sells them in her own town. She has a strong customer base. She has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. She wants to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business to get a boost in her earnings with her loan.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business to get a boost in her earnings with her loan.

loans.name: Ana Silvia

texts.es: Ana de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la confección de ropa desde hace 10 años, su taller de costura lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes por la calidad con que realiza la ropa, Ana está solicitando un crédito para la compra de hilos, agujas, variedad de tela, botones, elásticos, etc. y así poder continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Ana, 51, lives in her own house with her husband and two children.  She has earned her living sewing clothing for 10 years.  Her shop is in her house.  She has a lot of clients due to the quality with which she makes the clothing.  She is seeking a loan to buy thread, needles, a variety of fabrics, buttons, elastic, etc., so she can continue to do her job, which brings in nice profits.

loans.use: to buy thread, needles, a variety of fabrics, buttons, elastic, etc.

loans.name: 8 De Diciembre  (Montecristi) Group

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito 8 De Diciembre se reúne cada quince días en Montecristi  conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
Este grupo está integrado por 10 mujeres y 2 hombres, este es un grupo personas muy humildes y trabajadoras que al enterarse de los beneficios que les brinda la institución decidieron unirse y formar este grupo con el cual esperan salir adelante. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como la artesanía, comercio en general, entre otras actividades.
 Forma parte de  este grupo la señora Ángela, tiene 51 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 2 hijos mayores  de edad e independientes. Su marido es albañil. 
Doña Ángela aprendió hace varios años corte y confección en una Academia de la localidad, así con el paso de los días ella instalo un pequeño taller de costura en su casa, ella  confecciona ropa deportiva y uniformes, son muchos los contratos que ella tiene para elaborar equipos deportivos, ella también en época de entrada a clases elabora uniformes con lo cual en estos días tiene mucho trabajo y sus ganancias aumentan, lleva más de 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual sale adelante.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar telas, hilos, cierres y otros materiales de costura. Este es su primer ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos. Sus sueños son mejorar su taller y tener más maquinas.
texts.en:
The "8 De Diciembre" communal bank meets every fortnight in Montecristi, a place known for it's rich pre-colonial culture and it's handicrafts. It is known both nationally and internationally as the home of the famous Panama hat.

This group is made up of 10 women and 2 men. It is a group of simple and hard-working people who on learning of the benefits that the institution provides decided to form this group in the hopes of getting ahead. They work in a variety of businesses like handicrafts, general commerce, amongst other activities.

Ángela is part of the group. She is 51 years old, is married and from this relationship has 2 adult, independent children. Her husband is a bricklayer. Ángela learned how to sew in an Academy in the community a number of year ago and with the passing of time opened a small sewing workshop in her house.

She sews sorts wear and uniforms. Many of the contracts she has are to make sports wear. At the beginning of classes she makes uniforms and she has much work in these days and her income increases. She has been dong this business for more than 10 years and it get her ahead. This new loan will be used to buy fabric, thread, zippers and other sewing materials.

This is her first loan with the communal bank and she likes it as the loan are quick. Her dream is to improve her workshop and have more machines.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, zippers and other sewing materials.

loans.name: Fikret

texts.en:
Fikret and his wife have been married for eight years, and he has two children. One of them is a 7-year-old son, and he goes to first class. The other child is his 4-year-old daughter. Fikret's wife is a housewife; she don’t work on incoming business because she takes care of her children. The family is living in Baku region. 

Fikret is a 35-year-old man who is a master builder. He has been in this business for nine years. Today he wants to increase his business. Fikret has applied for a loan in the amount of 1,200 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy materials for building. He is thankful to the Kiva organization and all lenders for the help.

loans.use: to buy materials for building to increase business, and in the future, he wants to help his children with their education.

loans.name: Banco Mujer De Paraiso Group

texts.es: Margarita tiene 46 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos menores de edad y dos ya mayores de edad. Debido a su numerosa familia y la falta de empleo que existe en la zona, ella decide iniciar con el cuido de ganado, para doble propósito (leche y carne) la cual vende en la comunidad y compradores de otras comunidades. Sus hijos mayores han logrado aprender el debido cuidado de estos animales y son los que se encargan de apoyarla con el ganado. Solicita este crédito para comprar dos novillos nuevos para engordarlos y venderlos dentro de nueve meses cuando logran el peso ideal. Eligió Fundación Mujer porque es una de las pocas instituciones que dan financiamiento a este tipo de actividades. Uno de sus sueños es ver a sus hijos terminar los estudios para que se conviertan en profesionales y no lleven una vida tan cansada como ella, además le gustaría ampliar la cantidad de novillos para vender en mayor proporción y mejorar con las ganancias su estilo de vida.
texts.en: Margarita is 46, married, and has four young children and two grown ones.  Because of her large family and the lack of employment in her area, she decided to start raising cows for two purposes (milk and meat).  She sells them in the community and to buyers from other communities.  Her grown children have succeeded in learning how to properly care for the animals and they're the ones in charge of helping her out with them.  Margarita is seeking this loan to buy young cows to fatten up and sell in nine months when they reach ideal weight.  She decided on Fundación Mujer because it's one of the few institutions that provide financing to this kind of activity.  One of Maragarita's dreams is to see her children finish school so they can become professionals and not live as exhausting a life as she has.  She would also like to grow the number of young cows she has so she can sell a greater proportion of them and use the profits to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy cows for two purposes.

loans.name: Vilma Esperanza

texts.es: Vilma de 57 años de edad se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de productos y los buenos preciso, Vilma  vive en casa propia con su esposo, y está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos como cosméticos, esmaltes, ganchos para el cabello, shampoo, tientes para el cabello, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Vilma is 57 years old and she sells personal use items. Her business is located in her place of residence and she has many clients because of her variety of products and her good prices. Vilma lives in her own house with her husband. She is requesting a loan to buy more products like cosmetics, nail polish, hair clips, shampoo, hair dye, etc. and thus be able to obtain more income.

loans.use: to buy more products like cosmetics, nails polish, hair clips, shampoo, hair dyes, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in oranges, limes, pineapples, papayas, cantaloupe, vanilla, milk, carrots, straws, etc.

loans.name: Fares

texts.en:
Fares is a 20-year-old single young man from a village near Bethlehem city. He lives with his parents and five brothers in a simple house. His father has a carpentry workshop where he makes furniture. Fares is a student in the university where he studies physiotherapy. He wants to complete his studies and open his own physiotherapy center in the future.

Fares took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to pay the university fees for this semester. By taking this loan, Fares will be able to complete his studies and find a job faster.

Fares appears in the photo.

loans.use: to pay the university fees for this semester.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the university fees for this semester

loans.name: Nasiykat

texts.ru: Насийкат, 32 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей школьного и дошкольного возраста. У Насийкат среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством и полеводством уже 5 лет. Благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Насийкат, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 0,50 Га собственной земли, где она выращивает клевер и картофель. Также у Насийкат в хозяйстве есть 1 корова, 2 бычка, 15 кур и 8 индюков. Ежемесячный доход от реализации сельскохозяйственной продукции оптовым покупателям составляет до 15,000 сом (KGS). Насийкат обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для откорма и перепродажи. Насийкат намерена расширить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи и позволит накопить средства на образование ее детей.
texts.en: Nasiykat is 32, married, and is raising three children with her spouse. Her children are school-age and preschool age. Nasiykat has a secondary education and has been raising livestock and planting crops for five years as the main source of income for her family. Thanks to her perseverance, dedication, and hard work, she currently owns 0.50 hectares of land where she plants clover and potatoes. She also has a cow, two bulls, 15 chickens, and 8 turkeys. She earns up to 15,000 som (KGS) per month by selling agricultural products wholesale. Nasiykat applied for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to purchase cows to fatten and resell. Nasiykat intends to expand her business, which will lead to an increase in profits and allow her to save money for her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase cows to fatten and resell

loans.name: Asia

texts.en:
Asia is a 49-year-old working woman. After her marriage, she felt that she should support her husband to improve their financial condition, so she started a business of selling cloth. She believes she can earn some respect and make a better world for her children and their education. 

Asia is famous among her neighbors for her collections, and she has a good client list. Currently, she needs a loan of 40,000 PKR  to purchase good-quality cloth of different colors to earn substantial profits through this investment. This would lead her to live a decent life and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase good-quality cloth of different colors to earn substantial profits through this investment.

loans.name: Kausar

texts.en:
Kausar is 38 years old. She is a married lady and has been running a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Kausar makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make her store fully stocked she requested a loan of 55,000 PKR, which she will use to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available for her customers. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Kausar wishes to utilize part of her revenues for providing a good quality life to her family members.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available for her customers.

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en:
Sakina is 53 years old and a married woman. She has five children. She is a vigorous lady, and for the past many years, has been running a cloth purchase and sale business. She buys cloth in various fabrics, in different colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. 

Now, she has requested a loan of 35,000 PKR to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her business. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan. Sakina expects a boost in her earnings with the loan, and she plans to spend part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her business.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 28-year-old, single man from Deir Al-Balah city. He is an employee in the public sector with a very low income. Mahmoud is also working in transferring goods in the market. He uses his rickshaw. It is a good business and provides a good income.

Mahmoud wants to improve his work and buy more products from the wholesalers to sell to local traders. He can buy huge amounts with lower prices.
Mahmoud appears in the photo on his rickshaw

loans.use: to buy more products from the wholesalers to sell to local traders

loans.name: Imbaraga Group

texts.en:
The group is called IMBARAGA, which means “POWER” in English. The members of the group sell different products and they have common goals to scale their business for a better future. 

Apolianarie is 47 years old. She is married with four children between the ages of 5 and 20; all of them go to school. She sells clothes and has been in a business for seven years. With the loan, she would like to buy more clothes to resell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to resell.

loans.name: Janepher's Group

texts.en:
Janepher's Group is formed of ten farmers in Kakamega North District and is being represented by Janepher, who is the group leader pictured above. She is forty-two years old, married and has four children. Janepher has been a farmer for twenty years and is often referred to as a very friendly person.

Janepher isn’t new to One Acre Fund, she actually joined the program in 2012 and has since noticed her life has changed, especially in the sense that she has learnt a lot from farming trainings ever since. This year, Janepher will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition since now she will be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Using this loan, Janepher's Group will purchase a total of 9 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 4.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, hybrid seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Tafil

texts.en: Tafil has been feeling sick lately and a visit to a health specialist confirmed that he was suffering from some disease and that he needed immediately a surgical procedure.

loans.use: to pay for his surgery that has been scheduled to take place soon

loans.name: Jorge

texts.en: Jorge is 23 years old and works as a mason. He lives with his wife and he needs a loan to keep fixing his father's house where he lives. Jorge needs to buy paint and other construction materials. Jorge hopes you can help him again and he wishes to have his own house. Jorge is still the only person that makes money at his house.

loans.use: to continue fixing his father's house

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a twenty-four-year-old married man from Yatta, a village near Hebron city. He has a business, which is a barn for raising sheep. He started it three years ago. Mahmoud always thinks how he could improve his business and expand it.

Mahmoud requested a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more sheep for his barn. by taking this loan, Mahmoud's productivity levels for meat and milk will increase and, with this, his income as well. 

Mahmoud appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more sheep for his barn

loans.name: Jose

texts.en: Jose is 27 years old and single. He is a graphic designer. He lost his father some time ago and he lives with his mother. Jose works at an advertisement company but he doesn't have health insurance. He needs a loan to buy a laptop and a printer to do work by himself, in that way he will be able to increase his income and he will help his mother better.

loans.use: to buy a laptop and a printer

loans.name: Jafred's Group

texts.en:
Jafred is sixty-five years old and has nine children. He is a group leader and is representing his group of thirteen farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. 

Jafred has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of his desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods and, although he described his last harvest as very good, he believes he could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Jafred also decided to purchase two solar lights as part of his loan, which he is very excited about, as it will allow him to have an overall improved quality of life.

Obtaining this loan means that Jafred's Group will be able to receive a total of ten solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 9 acres.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Twiteganyirize Group

texts.en:
TWITEGANYIRIZE is a group led by Vicentie who is 53 years old. The group name means “save us” in English. Vicentie has been a group leader for six years. She sells foodstuffs and has been selling in a business for eight years. The group members sell different items and they have the same idea for changing their lives. 

With the loan, Vicentie would like to buy more beans and sorghum to resell. The profits from the business will be used to buy land and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more beans and sorghum to resell.

loans.name: Antonio Valentín

texts.en:
Antonio is a Kubo Financiero client and this is his story:

Antonio is 25 years old, single and currently studying college. He describes himself as a happy, hard-working and responsible person; during his free time he enjoys going out and spending time with his friends. 

He makes a living by working at an insurance company. His main responsibilities are attending the night shift: answering phone calls and sending out any ambulance that is needed. 

Antonio asks for this loan in order to be able to enroll in more subjects at his school and finish his degree as soon as possible.

loans.use: to be able to enroll in more subjects and finish his degree soon

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria lives and runs her business in Nikopol. She is a market entrepreneur selling clothing merchandise at the central marketplace of her home town.

 Maria launched this venture over 20 years ago.  She runs this business on her own and doesn't have any hired employees. 

Maria is seeking a loan of 10,000 Grivnyas to buy women's upper clothing for the colder winter season: dresses, jackets and coats. She is hoping to reinvest generated profit in further growth of her trade, opening new vending locations and stocking them with diversified merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase additional merchandise - dresses, coats and jackets

loans.name: Andrei

texts.en:
